statements: SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_info WHERE rider_id = 123;
SELECT payment_method, payment_amount FROM billing_and_payment_info WHERE payment_amount > 50;
SELECT rider_id, payment_method, payment_amount FROM billing_and_payment_info WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_info WHERE rider_id = 456 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM billing_and_payment_info;
SELECT trip_id, payment_amount FROM billing_and_payment_info WHERE rider_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_info WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT rider_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM billing_and_payment_info GROUP BY rider_id;
SELECT payment_method, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM billing_and_payment_info GROUP BY payment_method HAVING total_payments > 5;
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_info WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 AND payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT billing_address FROM billing_info WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM ride_payment ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM ride_payment WHERE payment_amount > 50.00;
SELECT ride_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM ride_payment WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT billing_address FROM billing_info WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY billing_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM ride_payment WHERE payment_amount > 50 ORDER BY payment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(ride_id) AS 'ride_count' FROM ride_payment GROUP BY user_id HAVING ride_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM billing_info JOIN ride_payment ON billing_info.user_id = ride_payment.user_id WHERE billing_address LIKE '%Ave%' AND payment_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_info LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, billing_address FROM billing_info WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT billing_id, user_id, payment_method FROM billing_info ORDER BY billing_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM ride_history WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT billing_id, billing_address FROM billing_info ORDER BY billing_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ride_history WHERE user_id = 54321 AND ride_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, start_location, end_location FROM ride_history ORDER BY ride_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 67890 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM billing_information;
SELECT user_id, payment_method, billing_address FROM billing_information WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_information ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ride_information WHERE fare_amount > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Refund' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_information;
SELECT billing_id, payment_method FROM billing_information WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT ride_id, fare_amount, pickup_location, dropoff_location FROM ride_information ORDER BY fare_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Payment' AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT name, email FROM riders WHERE rider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT rider_id, fare FROM trips WHERE fare > 50;
SELECT driver_id, car_make, car_model FROM drivers WHERE car_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT name, email FROM riders WHERE rider_id = 1;
SELECT driver_id, car_make, car_model FROM drivers WHERE car_year > 2015 ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT trip_date, fare FROM trips WHERE fare > 50.00 AND fare < 100.00 ORDER BY fare ASC;
SELECT rider_id, billing_address, credit_card_number FROM billing_info WHERE rider_id = 3 ORDER BY billing_address;
